entry.value: SELECT "NAME", "INCDOCS_ID", "EMP_ID", "MANAGER_ID", "ROLE_ID", "EMAIL_ID", "COMPANY_ID", "ENTITY_ID", "IS_CLIENT", "STATUS" FROM "INCDOCS"."USERS" u inner join "INCDOCS"."USER_ENTITLEMENTS" e on u."INCDOCS_ID" = e."USER_ID" where cast(u."INCDOCS_ID" as varchar)=:id
SELECT * FROM "INCDOCS"."USERS" u where cast(u."INCDOCS_ID" as varchar)=:id
UPDATE "INCDOCS"."USERS" SET "PASSWORD"=:pwd, "EMAIL_ID"=:email, "CONTACT_NUMBER"=:contact WHERE cast("INCDOCS_ID" as varchar)=:id
SELECT * FROM "INCDOCS"."ROLES" WHERE "IS_CLIENT"=:flag ORDER BY "ID" ASC

select r."ID" as ROLE_ID, r."NAME" as ROLE_NAME, r."DESCRIPTION" as ROLE_DESC, a."ID" as ACTION_ID, a."NAME" as ACTION_NAME, a."DESCRIPTION" as ACTION_DESC from "INCDOCS"."ROLE_ACTIONS" ra inner join "INCDOCS"."ROLES" r on ra."ROLE_ID"=r."ID" inner join "INCDOCS"."ACTIONS" a on ra."ACTION_ID"=a."ID" where ra."ROLE_ID"=:id

with entities as ( select e."ID", e."NAME", e."PARENT_ID" from "INCDOCS"."ENTITIES" e where "ID" = :id ), group_head as ( select ue."USER_ID" as GH_ID, ue."ENTITY_ID" from "INCDOCS"."USER_ENTITLEMENTS" ue inner join "INCDOCS"."USERS" u on ue."USER_ID" = u."INCDOCS_ID" inner join "INCDOCS"."ROLES" r on u."ROLE_ID" = r."ID" where ue."ENTITY_ID" in(select "ID" from entities) and r."NAME"='GROUP_HEAD' ) select e.*,h.GH_ID from entities e left join group_head h on e."ID" = h."ENTITY_ID"

with entities as ( select e."ID", e."NAME", e."PARENT_ID" from "INCDOCS"."ENTITIES" e where "PARENT_ID" = :id ), group_head as ( select ue."USER_ID" as GH_ID, ue."ENTITY_ID" from "INCDOCS"."USER_ENTITLEMENTS" ue inner join "INCDOCS"."USERS" u on ue."USER_ID" = u."INCDOCS_ID" inner join "INCDOCS"."ROLES" r on u."ROLE_ID" = r."ID" where ue."ENTITY_ID" in(select "ID" from entities) and r."NAME"='GROUP_HEAD' ) select e.*,h.GH_ID from entities e left join group_head h on e."ID" = h."ENTITY_ID"

with entities as ( select e."ID", e."NAME", e."PARENT_ID" from "INCDOCS"."ENTITIES" e where e."NAME" like :name ), group_head as ( select ue."USER_ID" as GH_ID, ue."ENTITY_ID" from "INCDOCS"."USER_ENTITLEMENTS" ue inner join "INCDOCS"."USERS" u on ue."USER_ID" = u."INCDOCS_ID" inner join "INCDOCS"."ROLES" r on u."ROLE_ID" = r."ID" where ue."ENTITY_ID" in(select "ID" from entities) and r."NAME"='GROUP_HEAD' ) select e.*,h.GH_ID from entities e left join group_head h on e."ID" = h."ENTITY_ID"
select * from "INCDOCS"."ROLES" e where e."ID" in(select "ROLE_ID" from "INCDOCS"."ENTITY_ROLES" where cast("ENTITY_ID" as varchar) = :id)
select * from "INCDOCS"."ROLES" e where e."ID" in(select "ROLE_ID" from "INCDOCS"."ENTITY_ROLES" where cast("ENTITY_ID" as varchar) = :id)
